sent.orig: But I think it most enjoyable to watch.
sent.trans: 但我却认为看拳击很有意思。

sent.orig: We had a most enjoyable journey.
sent.trans: 我们有一次最愉快的旅行。

sent.orig: As we were departing after a most enjoyable meal and conversation complimented Mr.
sent.trans: 令人愉快的晚宴和谈话结束以后，我们准备离开。

sent.orig: Your gentle, brainy energy is perfect for making life enjoyable for friends and family.
sent.trans: 你的文雅和聪明很适合在生活上愉悦亲人朋友。

sent.orig: Dream-descriptions make the works more literary and enjoyable by mixing reality and fantasies together.
sent.trans: 通过写梦境，使作品虚实相间，增强悬念，具有了文学性、可观赏性。
